ada eya ee aakarayen ma sidu nowuwath, eya bauddha wath pilewathwalin poshanaya wi thibunath yaksha gothrika (pandiyenge trayib yana aruthen nowana bawa nawatha nawathath awadharanaya kala yuthu ya), ehi yaksha sanskruthika lakshana dakiya haki ya.

wadiyathma hith parawana karanaya wanne, gatha wu kalaya desa mona tharam awagnyawen saha parihasayen yuthuwa ada hari baluwath, 2015 mul bhariye shubhawadi ismaththaka siti mohothe, sirisena-wika්ramasinha susanyogaya desa kawuruth baluwe, aluth ratak sandaha wana, enam aathma-unnathiya, pudgala wandanawa, dushanaya, nasthiya, hinsanaya, udasinathwaya saha gnyathi sanga්rahayen thora ratak sandaha padunu, hondama awasthawak washayeni. 2015 janawariye janadhipathiwaranayath, 2015 agosthuwe mathiwaranayath, danata balaye sitina aya wenuwen pa්rakashayata path chandayakata wada, eeta kalin pawathi sanskruthiyata, palana madiliyata saha samajayata erehiwa pawichchi kala chandayaki.
oba me pituwa wasa damiya yuththe thawath sanwedi kandulak samanga nowa, minisun aathmarthayen obbata gos karana kapa kirim wala gambauru wu watinakama sithhi daragenaya...

aarakshitha his wasumi samibandha nithiya 1991 janawari 11 wana dina anka 644 / 26 darana athi wishesha gasati patha්raye regulasi wala sadahanwa athi athara ema regulasi 1981 anka 21 darana motar wahana panathe 158 (2) ha 237 waganthiya yatathe pa්rawahana wishaya bhara amathyawaraya wisin sada atha.

samajayiya saradharma surakima, aagamika ha sanskruthika watinakam surakima, manawa wargayage saukh ya surakima ha parisaraye thulithathawa raka ganima sandaha wana karyan rasak reguwa wisin itu karanu labayi.
me lipiya ee nimiththeni.merata samajayiya ha deshapalana ithihasaye di.aar. wijayawardhana sha්rimathananta himi wanuye suwishesha thanaki.

athithaya harima mihiri saho,uba wagema mamath ohoma aahawwa.ee kaleta yanna apita ba.eeth ee nalawili kawi issarahata geniyanna aniwaryenma one.hamadetama dijital kramaya danawata api manapa nathi nisa.

piyumige mema hasirima sabhawe kathabahatada lak wiya.mema tharagaya inga්risi basin meheyawa thibuna athara ek ek tharagakariyange buddhi mattama danaganimata pa්rashna wimasana awasthaweth piyumi apahasuthawayata lakwu bawa warthawe.

mema aluth wadagath we, namuth elipaththa pahala, wikalpa sapekshawa shakthimath wana athara, simitha prathilabha saha thirasara puluwan.

allapu gedara balla rathi්ra kalaye nokadawa burana nisa padam kirimata badha wena bawin piyawarak ganna lesa upadhi apekshikawaka ga්rama niladhariwarayagen illa siti awasthawe ballage burana shabdaya noasennata nam iyarfon yugalayak pawiwch karana lesa danwu puwathak alawwa pa්radeshaye gammanayakin warthawe.

habayi yaluwane hitlar thaniyama yudewwo ras karala dum riye patawala hitlarma dum riya elawagena gihin gas kamara wala damma noweyi.jarman nasin adath jarmaniye innawa.owun ee samulaghathanaya anumatha karanawa.hitlar kale jarman janathawage illima.yudden pasu hungak nasin dakunu amarikawata pala giya.mengel wage aya digatama jarmaniya ekka samabandakam pawathwagena giya.uda hen ri blogwokar kiyala thibuna poddak ehemehe wuna nam api ada katha karanne jarman kiyala.
me satha awith masekata withara passe pare yana manussayekuwa hapanna panala ape amma sara kalama ape ammage urahisata panala ammawa peralagena hapala.

mak nisada ala, gowa, karat wala sitina panuwan marenne apa wenuwen me ahara sudanam kirimedi/ wagawe palibodha nashanayedi owun miya yana bawini.nirmansha yayi kiya ganimin budu dahama ha patalawa aluth sanskruthin bihi karannata yamath,nirmansha nowannawunta nirmansha wimata balapam kirimath,awabodhayen thora adahillakatath, wiruddhawaya ma me katha kale.

“aataka nataka” haraha me dawaswala ka atharath janapriya shantha gallage kiyana me kathawa mulinma ahanakota obata punchi dukak athi wunath anthima hariyata yanakota obatath ohuth ekkama hina wenna puluwan.
karunu soyana aayathanayak.
mata penne garandiya deshapremi garandiyek.
eeka eyage kamaththa ban..
wenada wagema kiyanna thiyenne, uththara balanna ikman wanna epa.
manasika aathathiya daraganimata athi hakiyawa pudgalayagen pudgalayata wenas we.
lankawe puwathpathwala prawruththi ya kiya samanyayen pala wanne oopadupa ho athe rol ya.
tikira: oone sellamak karanna puluwan.
muslim wasiyanta athi wi thibena hirihara pilibanda wa soya balanna oona.
sama damiyakatama yata kotase ran saha muthu warnaye pabalu allu patiya sawi karaganna.
oyata kiyanna mara gemak dila thamayi mechchara liyanna wath welawa hoya gaththe, ithin kohomada sapa sanipa ehema???????”

siyaluma krushi nipayum (wawili, pashu, dhiwara) aswanu sandaha himiwiya yuthu wana watinakama warthamanayata sapekshawa degunayakin pamana ihala nanwa (uda (- wi ki gra 1 k ru. 70 k, kiri li. 1 k ru. 100 k saha elawalu ala lunu ki. 1 k ru. 150 k pamana wana paridi ema mila ganan sthawara kara deshiya awashyathawanta anuwa nishpadana ilakkagatha kirima.)
me wana thek wruththiya samithiyak pudgalika anshaye watup wadikirima sambandhayen parlimenthuwata panathak idiripath karala na.

mema kamituwata samagamiwa kshanika prathichara kamituwakda sthapitha kara athi athara ehi sambandhikaraka washayen janatha wimukthi peramune nayaka anura kumara disanayaka mahatha katayuthu karana bawa sandahan.
mema athdakima thulin awabodhaya wadidiyunu wi, athitha purudu ratawan ahosi kara damayi.
me thiyana foto eka thamayi mage kamarawen mama gaththa pujaniyama chayarupe..asirimath buddhagayawa!
mehidi oba wisin pahatha liyawili pradeshiya lekam wetha idiripath kara awasaraya labaganna.
belog pakak nathath mawa oyalagema kenek wage salakapu eka mata aාngamibarayak...nawathath oba samata sthuthiyi.
''thopi nan marila yayi!
me gana obe adahasa."
ek ek ayage kathawa wiwidhayi.lingikathwaya kiyanne pudgalayakuge jiwithaye thawath ek pathikadak witharayi.

-me pudgalaya dumriya thula (anek manginta sapekshawa) pasupasata awidina wegaya dumriya dumriyen pitatha nishchalawa sitina ayekuta sapekshawa idiriyata yana wegayata wada adu bawa upakalpanaya kala hoth ese dumriyen pitatha sitina ayekuta sapekshawa me pudgalaya yanne idiriyataya.

horana nagaraya kendra karaganimin thama ape wyapara meheyune.wyaparaya gana kiyanna kalin rabar roti nishpadanayenma patan gannam dumgasu rabar roti nishpadanaya meka tikak mahansi wiyayuthu wagema mana athe huruwak thibiya yuthu karmanthayak.mulinma rabar gasa kapa kiri ekathu kala yuthu wenawa..kapanawa kiyane porawak genawith kapana eka nemei ekata wishesha pihiyak menma thakshanika kramawedayak da thiyenawa nuthana kiri pihiyak sampradayika kiri pihiya oya pihiya aadarayen kapaganna kiri tika ekathu wenne yata thiyena polkattata ekata tika welawak gatha wenawa eelagata kiri tika akulanna ooni akulanawa kiyanne polkatu wala ekathu wechcha kiri tika baldiyakata ekathu karanawa..loku baldiyakuth ussagena gahen gahata kiri ekathu kara kara yanawa kiyana eka sahenna wehesa kara katayuththak..ohoma ekathu karagaththa kiri tika genawa kiri maduwata ethanadi rabar asid ehema nathnam fomik asid ekathu karanawa.thanikara asid nemei 1ta 16 wathura ekathu karala thanuka karala thama ekathu karanne..eelagata kiri tika peranawa..3 parak withara peranna ooni ihala gunathmaka bawayen yuth rabar rotiyak sadimata namuth samanayen 1 parak perala hadanawa mahansiya kalaya wani karunu prayogikathwayedi ismathu wena nisa peragaththu rabar kiri tika eelagata thati walata dala thiyenawa midenna mekata paya 4k 5k athara kalayak gatha wenawa..

karmanthashala walin pitakarana jalaya nisi lesa piripahaduwata lak nokara muda harima, sathun, wahana aadiya sedimata bhawitha karana jalaya nisi piripahaduwakin thorawa gangawalata muda harima aadi minisata siyayata siyayak palanaya kala haki namuth apa wisin hithamathama nosalakaharina kriyakarakam nisa jalaya apawithra wanawa.

namuth eewa wadikal pawathinne nathi bawa sithata ganna oona.

lankeya sangitha kshethraye amaradewiya wu amara ranathunga mahathmiya bharathiya ragadhari sangithayath, dakshina bharathiya karnataka sangithayath, hela sangitha sampradayan menma boho wides sangitha sampradayan pilibandawada hasala danumin piripunwa swakiya guru bhumikawada, gayana paurushayada op nanwagath wishishta kalakariniyaki.

shrilanipaye wathman arbudayata 1977n pasuwa deshiya thalaye athiwu wenaskam da hethuwiya. 1977 balayata path eksath jathika paksha aanduwa wiwrutha aarthika kramaya kriyathmaka kirimath samaga deshiya aarthikaye hadagasma barapathala wenasakata bhajanaya wiya.
ehenan meyayi path kora ganimuya kiyala onna ee manussaya path koragaththa kiyamuko.
lankawe nayek !!!

awasanawakata aarakshaka hamudawe sebalun wishala pramanayak randi sitima magin da, aarakshaka hamuda pawul ha anek aya sandaha niwasa godanagima siduweya yana biya nisa da, uthure yam asthawara bawak pawathina bawa penennata thibe.
diwi thibena thura mihiri wachanaya bhawitha karami, diwihimiyen kelam kimen walakimi.
samadhiya ha dhyana pilibanda mema karunu oba dana sitiyada?
ee rate kunu walinuth puluwan tharam prayojana gannawa..
eeth eeta ehayin thibunu apuru aluth welanda kutiyak dihawata mage as yomu wuna...
eken krikat tharaga galaweyi!
aya kelinma giye nalala thuwala wela hitapu rogiya lagata.

habayi me wenuwen mudalak aya karanawa.
mata therune na ne?:/
ee lankawe inna bahutharaya wana dhanawath nowana pirisata oona karana de iraj dena nisada?
ee siyalu winashayanta mul wuye sakayayi.

ohuth me wadedi boho bara karata aran.me wenakotath dakune pala kola wides sancharakayan athara janapriya kara athi heritans ena hama sancharakayakutama mathaka hitina aahara welak dennayi wehesenne.ithin me amuthu widiye game kama tharagaya awasanaye dinapu hamotama ran, ridi, lokada padakkam saha kapawima wenuwen watina sahathikayakuth pirinamuna.lunu kapannata aa thurunu supawediyakuwa arambai gaman mage, ada adhyakshawarayaku se heritans babalawana gamunu gunawardhana adhyakshawarayage sewaya agayana wita ohuge daswala sathutu kandulu.ihala niladharinya yana mathaye noinda hama kenekutama owun samipawa athi bawa apita danune me thurunu supawedin owunta dana nama gaurawa karaddi.me samipakama koyitharam apuruda...
iwasala iwasala barima thanada koheda pora adiyak hema polawe happala aayeth "kiwwama ahala piligannawa ayise..
sidni nagaraye di mage eeye dawasa krikat samaga gewunu ha...
thawa tika kalak yana wita ara wahala da sahena watina kiyana ekak wanu atha.
eekata wiruddha naduk gihin thiyenawa 2007 di.
man aadare karanna patan gaththa kenekta.
“ayi ehema kiyanne..?
udaharanayakata mini marumakadi ghathakayata maraniya dandanaya dimen ghathanaya karana labu thanaththage pranaya nawatha lakhenne nathi bawa pahadiliyi.
ane ow ban mama dan mekane karanne.
me athpathrika bedaharime wadapiliwelata...
"ane mata samawenna..
adala thirubadu "asadharana" bawa pawasana dakunu koriyawa kiya sitiye ee sambandhayen loka welanda aayathanayata paminili karana bawaya.
ma oba laga radennada...
“akke sithuni innawa niladiya steshame.”
apita ara kalin katha karapu jathiwadayange wiwidha swarupa athara gatuma hambenne methanadi.

indiya rajayen owunta purawasibhawaya denneda nathi athara yuda ginimada pana beragannata umathuwen men pala giya pirisak lesa lankawe purawasiyan bawa thahawuru kirimata pawa owunta kisidu lekhanayak natha.

gataluwakata wisandum sewima, yam shasthi්raya karunak gana sithima, ehemath nathinam thama katayuthu sanwidhanaya gana salasum kirima wani pa්rayojanawath deyak gana sithima hanikara nathath nishchitha aramunakin thorawa kalpana kirima anawashya manasika wehesata hethu wiya hakiya.
api wage samanya aya karanna oone ee sandaha uthsahawantha wena eka unata ee de karanne ehemath kenek kiyalayi mama kiwwe.
danata pawathina nithiya anuwa siwil naduwaka paminilla ho pethsama naduwe wibhagayata pera yam yam simawanta yatathwa oonama wara gananak sanshodhanaya kala haka.
finiks nam noweyi.
maithri 10 wani waratath shrilanipaya ejapayata pawa dunna - prasannagen helidarawwak
padanam pahuru mulinma sindabinda damimatayi, budurajanan wahanse anudana wadale, “sabbathe pasuka bhagga” ese nam nuwanasin yuth manasikathwayen nasayata danena de aaghranaya karanawa nowe.
“ kumarikawa bera ganna..”
